summary: Project to add an admin dashboard map view using Google Maps JS API to display shipment markers fetched from /api/shipments.
architectural_notes: Admin dashboard includes Google Maps JS API script tag with callback=initMap.
public/maps.js defines initMap() that initializes map and fetches /api/shipments to place markers when lat/lng are present.
known_issues: Google Maps API key is being added directly in HTML; key exposure risk unless restricted (HTTP referrer restrictions) or moved to safer configuration.

existing_features.title: Configure the Google Maps JavaScript API key so the Admin Dashboard “Live Tracking” tab successfully loads Google Maps and renders shipment markers. Use this exact key value: "AIzaSyC0ZPKa3tgNMATa8PwdUheyhIAH1E3Gi9o".

new_feature_requests.summary: Integrate Google Maps on admin dashboard and render shipment markers from /api/shipments via initMap in public/maps.js (include Maps JS API script with key + callback).

projectName: Configure Google Maps API key for Admin Live Tracking map
